step2.title: Share via QR or NFC

testimonials.title: What Our Valued Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real opinions from satisfied users about our services and their outstanding experience

testimonial1.name: Ahmed Mohammed Al-Salem
testimonial1.title: Sales Manager - Advanced Technology Company
testimonial1.review: Amazing platform and very easy to use. It saved me a lot of time and effort in sharing my professional information with clients and partners.

testimonial2.name: Fatima Ahmed Al-Zahrani
testimonial2.title: Graphic Designer & Founder of Creative Studio
testimonial2.review: Beautiful designs and very easy customization. I now share my work and portfolio in a more professional and distinctive way.

testimonial3.name: Mohammed Ali Al-Ahmadi
testimonial3.title: Entrepreneur & Founder of Innovation Company
testimonial3.review: The statistics and analytics are very useful for tracking my professional network performance and measuring my digital card impact. Highly recommend it.
